briefdescription.para: function to initialize the struct containing the values and read the the activation CSV file.

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values errAllocDataPhysValves, errAllocDataPhysSensors, errAllocDataActivation in case of a malloc allocation error or noError when the function exits successfully.
statusErrDef noError when the function exits successfully.

briefdescription.para: function to read "activation.csv" until the end of the file.

parameterdescription.para: location and name of the CSV file to read

simplesect.para: statusErrDef errOpenPhysSensorsFile when the file fails to open, noError when the function exits successfully.

briefdescription.para: function to read "liaisonEGEtat.csv" until the end of the file.

parameterdescription.para: location and name of the CSV file to read

simplesect.para: statusErrDef errOpenEGFile when the file fails to open, noError when the function exits successfully.

briefdescription.para: function to fill in the activation CSV structure.

parameterdescription.para: the position of the line in the CSV file.

briefdescription.para: function to fill in the link between EG and CSV file name structure.

parameterdescription.para: the position of the line in the CSV file.

briefdescription.para: function getter of the activation of a sensor or a valve from "activation.csv"

parameterdescription.para: the line in the CSV file

simplesect.para: uint8_t the activation of a sensor or a valve (1 if activated or 0 if not)

briefdescription.para: function getter of the general state from "liaisonEGEtat.csv"

parameterdescription.para: the line in the CSV file

simplesect.para: uint16_t the value of the general state of a specific line

briefdescription.para: function that removes the carriage return from the end a line of a general state CSV file before strdup is called.

parameterdescription.para: the line in the CSV file

briefdescription.para: Module to read CSV configuration files.

detaileddescription.para:
Mael Parot, Benoit Brice
1.2
11/04/2024
Contains all functions related to reading CSV files and writing the content into structures.
